attributes.action: PUBLICISE THE (LEGAL) SECRET TO REPORTING UNSAFE WORKING CONDITIONS
attributes.additional_details:
The Government must ensure employees who need to speak up about workplace safety concerns know about the legal protection provided by Section 44 Employment Rights Act 1996 - by incorporating it into the Health & Safety Information for Employees poster which, by law, must be displayed in a prominent position in each workplace.


For more information visit:

http://www.section44.co.uk
